scan_table_check.description: The AppInstall() function of a scoped application is designed to be executed as part of the installation process. Whatever cannot be shipped as part of the scoped application can be done via script within the AppInstall() function. However, no changes to records should be done "directly" using GlideRecord or other OOTB API functions. Instead only functions contained in the DevTools InstallerAPI class should be used. This ensures consistent logging and error handling and allows to determine which modifications are to be expected from the AppInstall() script without actually performing the modifications. As a result update(), insert() and updateMultiple() and deleteRecord() functions are not allowed with AppInstall Script Includes.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - AppInstall must not modify records directly
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Use functions contained in the DevTools InstallerAPI class instead to perform record modifications.
